extendedInfo.description: Vote for us on Steam Greenlight if you'd like to see this game available on PC!http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=139893849#1 Top New Paid App on Google Play!Optimized for Nvidia Tegra 3!Now supports MOGA Pro controllers (Mode A)PS3 and Xbox 360 Controllers (USB only)Please note: Make sure the controller is pluggedinto the device before starting the app.From the award winning studio that brought you Ravensword: The Fallen King and Aralon: Sword and Shadow, comes RAVENSWORD: SHADOWLANDS. Ravensword brings unprecedented visuals to the role playing and adventure genre. Explore a vast and richly detailed world, gather powerful weapons, collect hundreds of items, increase your skills, and follow a deep storyline to solve the mysteries of the Kingdom of Tyreas. Features: Enormous 3d world to explore First Person and 3rd Person on the fly switching Gorgeous and realistic scenery Ragdoll Physics Original Soundtrack from composer Sean Beeson Hundreds of items to use Reflex and precision based combat with manual blocking and dodging Various weapon types - Bows, Crossbows, Hammers, Swords, Axes Flying Mounts Horses Tons of enemy types including huge prehistoric creatures. Lockpicking Pick Pocketing Stealth Magical Runes Item enhancement Tons of loot Plenty of armor upgrades Mounted combat Decision based, multi-part Quests Reputation and Jail System follow @cm_games on Twitter for more updates and announcements!

reviews.title: Best game period
reviews.comment: Graphics were amazing, long gameplay, controls were fantastic. This is well worth the money of you like game like fable, skyrim, or elder scrolls.
reviews.author: Jonathan Slamko

reviews.title: Thumbs. Up
reviews.comment: The best game so far on Android good graphics good movability . I could of sworn this was a elder scrolls replica but the side quest was too short but still this game alone has the best graphics so far on Android .worth the money !,:-)
reviews.author: Carl Bias

reviews.title: No longer works with update
reviews.comment: Game was updated 8/6/13 and no longer starts. Tried to get on the site but that\'s down too. Emailed the devs with no response. Poor first impressions considering I\'ve only had the game for three days. Galaxy s3 here
reviews.author: Megan Plattner

reviews.title: No longer loading
reviews.comment: Since last update game gets stuck at the initial screen and doesn\'t move forward.   Has even frozen my device.   Was working fine before update.   Using a Nook HD+.
reviews.author: Chris York

reviews.title: Elder Scroll Wannabe!
reviews.comment: this is great game. highly recommended for those RPG fans. especially elder scroll series. it have a great ragdoll physics. please put exit button on the menu/main menu and please make the map easier to view. its superb and addictive
reviews.author: Fadzil Mohd Ashari

reviews.title: Rip Off...mildly put...
reviews.comment: Got taken for the $7 won\'t even load past the start screen...subtle touch on the 15min refund window....tried to get it to start up for a half hour then gave up
reviews.author: Dave Stevens

reviews.title: Finally works
reviews.comment: After uninstalling and reinstalling about 5 times, it finally works with my Moga Pro and hasn\'t crashed yet. Fingers crossed...
reviews.author: Bryan McAfee

reviews.title: No controller support :(
reviews.comment: The main problem I get in game while trying use a controller is that when first starting the game and get to the main menu, all it shows is a black Mountain in the background with no menu pops ups. And pressing button on the controller does absolutely nothing.
reviews.author: Christian Marte

reviews.title: Dint even get to play at all!!!!!
reviews.comment: It tells me if I want my nvidia shield CONTROLLER to connect and I click yes and then it loads the background to the main menu but nothing else! WTF GAMELOFT!? I WAS TOTALY RIPED OF FOR 6.99 !!!!!!
reviews.author: Ronald Donaire

reviews.title: Control pads stop the menu loading
reviews.comment: I bought this on the premise of using my Xbox controller or Bluetooth controller when I launch the game it detects the controller and then doesn\'t load the menu after, it does this on my a500 and one, on both the Xbox controller and my ipega BT controller, works fine without the controller plugged in
reviews.author: Robert Brewer

reviews.title: Doesn\'t detect mouse clicks
reviews.comment: The game seems good, but I don\'t have a touch-enabled device, just a mouse/keyboard/gamepad so I can\'t advance past the \"Play with gamepad\" screen.  The game doesn\'t detect mouse-clicks as touch events.  If I disconnect the gamepad, same issue.  I will edit if this issue is resolved.
reviews.author: Ben Curry

reviews.title: Skyrim for Android
reviews.comment: Simply the most fun game I\'ve played on android so far.
reviews.author: thomeas Coati

reviews.title: Excelent
reviews.comment: This game is a very good game. Its has everything I wanted from an RPG trype game. I however have one problem. I crash on my game. Everyone with my model phone (xperia ion) has the same problem. I hope the company can fix this problem.  I would also be cool if they made a fallout kind of game.
reviews.author: John pena

reviews.title: pretty good
reviews.comment: Back button doesn\'t give the option to exit. Have to force close each time
reviews.author: Tito Rocha

reviews.title: Cant play it anymore, new update fail.
reviews.comment: Was great until new update.. can\'t play it anymore, it keeps booting me off.
reviews.author: jacob atkinson

reviews.title: does not work with moga
reviews.comment: opens fine without moga on my note 2 but hangs on a screen with mountains clouds and music. bought it mainly for moga. pls fix!
reviews.author: Genar Macapugay

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: No longer works on my galaxy s3 either. Worked till last update, not impressed
reviews.author: Chris Kuchirka

reviews.title: Can\'t play after update
reviews.comment: Playing on a ASUS Eee Pad TF and it only played once. Every time after that it crashes and won\'t get past the start game window. I need a refund, am very disappointed in this game\'s lack of support for devices.
reviews.author: Gabe Shakkori

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: Fun game resembles skyrim just a lot smaller, runs great on galaxy s3.
reviews.author: andrew arbogast

reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
reviews.comment: Game was updated near the beginning of August and no longer starts. It hangs on the \"Unity\" logo on the loading screen. See the many complaints about this in reviews below. No response from the developers.
reviews.author: David Lanham
